testsuite.name: com.ae.qa.testcases.PurgeSchedulePageTest
testsuite.system-out: User log in Successfully Add button clicked Schedule created for day of Month

testcase.name: validatePurgingScheduleWeekendTest

failure.message: Schedule not created for day of week expected [Schedule created successfully] but found [Next fire time is too close to update/create time, skipping it. Setting the Next fire time as [Tue, 30-May-2023 20:30 PM IST]]
